android.permission.INTERNET.description: Allows an application to create network sockets.

android.permission.ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE.description: Allows an application to view the status of all networks.

android.permission.CAMERA.description: Allows application to take pictures and videos with the camera. This allows the application to collect images that the camera is seeing at any time.

android.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAG.description: Allows an application to write to the SD card.

android.permission.READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE.description: Allows an application to read from SD Card.

android.permission.ACCESS_WIFI_STATE.description: Allows an application to view the information about the status of Wi-Fi.

android.permission.ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATIO.description: Access coarse location sources, such as the mobile network database, to determine an approximate phone location, where available. Malicious applications can use this to determine approximately where you are.

android.permission.ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION.description: Access fine location sources, such as the Global Positioning System on the phone, where available. Malicious applications can use this to determine where you are and may consume additional battery power.

android.permission.READ_PHONE_STATE.description: Allows the application to access the phone features of the device. An application with this permission can determine the phone number and serial number of this phone, whether a call is active, the number that call is connected to and so on.

android.permission.WAKE_LOCK.description: Allows an application to prevent the phone from going to sleep.

com.google.android.c2dm.permission.RECEI.description: Permission for cloud to device messaging.

com.web_view_mohammed.ad.webview_app.per.description: Allows the application to receive push notifications.

manifest_analysis.title:
Clear text traffic is Enabled For App
[android:usesCleartextTraffic=true]
manifest_analysis.desc: The app intends to use cleartext network traffic, such as cleartext HTTP, FTP stacks, DownloadManager, and MediaPlayer. The default value for apps that target API level 27 or lower is "true". Apps that target API level 28 or higher default to "false". The key reason for avoiding cleartext traffic is the lack of confidentiality, authenticity, and protections against tampering; a network attacker can eavesdrop on transmitted data and also modify it without being detected.
manifest_analysis.name: Clear text traffic is Enabled For App [android:usesCleartextTraffic=true]

manifest_analysis.title:
App has a Network Security Configuration
[android:networkSecurityConfig]
manifest_analysis.desc: The Network Security Configuration feature lets apps customize their network security settings in a safe, declarative configuration file without modifying app code. These settings can be configured for specific domains and for a specific app.
manifest_analysis.name: App has a Network Security Configuration [android:networkSecurityConfig]

manifest_analysis.title:
Application Data can be Backed up
[android:allowBackup=true]
manifest_analysis.desc: This flag allows anyone to backup your application data via adb. It allows users who have enabled USB debugging to copy application data off of the device.
manifest_analysis.name: Application Data can be Backed up [android:allowBackup=true]

manifest_analysis.title:
Broadcast Receiver (com.google.android.gms.measurement.AppMeasurementInstallReferrerReceiver) is Protected by a permission, but the protection level of the permission should be checked.
Permission: android.permission.INSTALL_PACKAGES
[android:exported=true]
manifest_analysis.desc: A Broadcast Receiver is found to be shared with other apps on the device therefore leaving it accessible to any other application on the device. It is protected by a permission which is not defined in the analysed application. As a result, the protection level of the permission should be checked where it is defined. If it is set to normal or dangerous, a malicious application can request and obtain the permission and interact with the component. If it is set to signature, only applications signed with the same certificate can obtain the permission.
manifest_analysis.name: is Protected by a permission, but the protection level of the permission should be checked.[android:exported=true]

playstore_details.title: All social media and social networks in one app
playstore_details.description:
Save your effort, time and storage space on your phone with the application of all social media and social networks for shopping and messengers, im and international news as well as ads, real estate. and some educational sites. Enjoy travel and tourism sites and watching entertainment video, SMS sites on your smartphone. Download now and you will not regret.

 ▶ - Application features of all social media and social networks: -

📍 - Save up to 70% on your phone's memory. You do not need to install many social media and family social network chats as you can provide approximately 140MB on your mobile phone. Quick access to ads sites like eBay and Admob and messaging friends via instant messaging.

📍 -  Provided with an in-app search engine. For easy access to all social networks and social networks in one application. To enjoy all the SMS. marketing video maker and shopping, international sports sites and messengers Facebook as well as ads. you can visit real estate and some educational sites on your phone.

🔒 - All social media and social networks are locked with a secret number: to keep your information confidential and to prevent information thieves from accessing the accounts of all social networking sites like Quora and LinkedIn...etc.

💓- Sort your favorite sites in a special box.

📍 - All social media and social networks is a free private browser for social media and social networks chats. The all-in-one social media app displays a lot of social media such as instant messaging that allows you to chat, video calls and send instant messages on social networks. It also provides you with a lot of great marketing sites like Alibaba and Amazon and makes you spend happy times on entertainment sites like YouTube and TikTok and enjoy music and SMS with your loved ones. International sports websites and international news, as well as ads, real estate, and some educational sites and fun games on your smartphone.

📍 - You can browse more than 500 social media and social networks for fans of marketing on social media, send messages via Facebook and Twitter as well as to display ads from the popular eBay website and send SMS messages.

📍 - Ease of use: browse all social media, family social network, marketing, and social media applications by accessing YouTube. You can also access all instant messaging and ads, im apps like messengers Facebook , which also allow you to send instant messages from your phone in one app.


📍 - New websites have been added to the media in special sections such as sports and news sites. in addition to marketing sites, many travel and tourism sites, some sites, educational services and real estate sites. Targeting depends on countries and languages.

📍 - In one app for all social media and social networks that includes the most popular sites such as marketing and Messengers, SMS. explore beautiful pictures and share them with Pinterest. Watch movies on some great sites like Netflix. It also contains the Wattpad website to marketing books free.

🔴- We are not affiliated with any of the services that can be accessed through this application. We do not have access to your data.

✋- Programs without a website cannot be accessed through this app. Therefore it must be downloaded to the phone
playstore_details.summary: less space, all in one social media and social networks chats, messengers & SMS
playstore_details.summaryHTML: less space, all in one social media and social networks chats, messengers & SMS
